wikipedia_page.main: Harrison "Harry" Fearnley (27 May 1923 – 6 January 2012) was an English professional footballer. He was born in Dewsbury. A goalkeeper, he began his career with Leeds United in 1946 before joining Halifax Town in 1948. In 1949 he joined Newport County and went on to make 103 appearances for the club. In 1953 he joined Selby Town, then appeared once for Rochdale in 1956 before moving to Winsford United.

response: * Harry Fearnley (footballer, born 1923) (1923–2012), English footballer for Leeds United and Newport County
* Harry Fearnley (footballer, born 1935) (1935–2013), football goalkeeper for Huddersfield Town, Oxford United and Doncaster Rovers
